info.title: Dupno Tracker API - GPS Tracking & Fleet Management Bangladesh
info.description: Official API of Dupno Tracker, Bangladesh’s leading BTRC-approved GPS tracking service provider offering real-time vehicle tracking, fleet management, fuel monitoring, and load monitoring solutions.

get.summary: Get Dupno Tracker GPS tracking products and fleet management solutions
get.description: Retrieve information about Dupno Tracker products including car GPS tracker, fleet management system, fuel monitoring system, vehicle load monitoring, and advanced telematics features.

200.description: Successful response with product and service details

products.name: Car GPS Tracker
products.description: Real-time GPS tracker with engine cut, geo-fence alerts, and mobile app access.

products.name: Fleet Management System
products.description: Advanced fleet tracking with route optimization, fuel reports, and driver behavior monitoring.

products.name: Fuel Monitoring System
products.description: Sensor and OBD/CAN-based fuel monitoring with real-time alerts.

products.name: Vehicle Load Monitoring
products.description: Suspension-based load weight monitoring solution, first time in Bangladesh.
